[i]Exalt of Plegia[/i] – Other Risen and Faceless you control get +1/+0 and must attack each combat if able.
[i]Grimleal's Blade[/i] – Whenever another legendary creature you control dies, exile it. Create a token copy of that creature, except it is a Risen and is black in addition to its color and types.
[i]Shattered Timeline[/i] – Whenever a opponent taps a creature they control to attack or activate an ability, put a stun counter on that creature.
